name: anki-claude-plugin
description: Create and manage Anki flashcards directly from Claude Code via AnkiConnect
author: Joseph Muller

external_dependencies.name: AnkiConnect
external_dependencies.description: Anki add-on that provides an API for external applications (code: 2055492159)

commands.name: create-flashcard
commands.description: Create a new Anki flashcard with custom content, deck, and tags

commands.name: find-cards
commands.description: Search for Anki flashcards using keywords or advanced query syntax

commands.name: list-decks
commands.description: List all existing Anki decks with statistics

commands.name: review-due
commands.description: Show count of Anki flashcards due for review by deck

commands.name: anki-review
commands.description: Review Anki flashcards interactively with ease ratings

agents.name: anki-flashcard-manager
agents.description: Create Anki flashcards, add cards to decks, find cards due for review, or interact with AnkiConnect API

agents.name: anki-flashcard-reviewer
agents.description: Review Anki flashcards interactively, one at a time, with ease ratings
